00037 #ifndef EGS_SCORING_
00038 #define EGS_SCORING_
00039 
00040 #include "egs_libconfig.h"
00041 #include "egs_functions.h"
00042 #include "egs_math.h"

00044 #include <iostream>
00045 using namespace std;
00046 
00063 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ScoringSingle {
00064 
00065 public:
00066 
00068     EGS_ScoringSingle() : sum(0), sum2(0), tmp(0), current_ncase(0) {};
00069 
00078     inline void score(unsigned short ncase, EGS_Float f) {
00079         if( ncase == current_ncase ) tmp += f;
00080         else finishCase(ncase,f);
00081     };
00082 
00086     inline void finishCase(unsigned short new_case, EGS_Float new_result) {
00087         current_ncase = new_case;
00088         sum += tmp; sum2 += tmp*tmp; tmp = new_result;
00089     };
00090 
00092     EGS_Float currentScore() const { return tmp; };
00093 
00096     void      currentScore(EGS_Float &s, unsigned short &ncase) const {
00097                   s = tmp; ncase = current_ncase;
00098     };
00099 
00102     void      currentScore(double &s, double &s2) { s=sum; s2=sum2; };
00103 
00110     void      currentResult(EGS_I64 ncase, double &r, double &dr) {
00111                   r = sum + tmp; dr = sum2 + tmp*tmp;
00112                   r /= ncase; dr /= ncase; dr -= r*r;
00113                   if( dr > 0 ) dr = sqrt(dr/(ncase-1));
00114     };
00115 
00127     bool storeState(ostream &data) {
00128         //sum += tmp; sum2 += tmp*tmp; tmp = 0;
00129         //data << current_ncase << "  " << sum << "  " << sum2 << endl;
00130         data << current_ncase << "  " << sum+tmp << "  " << sum2+tmp*tmp
00131              << endl;
00132         return data.good();
00133     };
00134 
00144     bool setState(istream &data) {
00145         data >> current_ncase >> sum >> sum2; tmp = 0;
00146         return data.good();
00147     };
00148 
00152     void reset() { current_ncase = 0; tmp = 0; sum = 0; sum2 = 0; };
00153 
00161     EGS_ScoringSingle &operator+=(const EGS_ScoringSingle &x) {
00162         sum += tmp + x.sum + x.tmp;
00163         sum2 += tmp*tmp + x.sum2 + x.tmp*x.tmp;
00164         current_ncase = 0; tmp = 0;
00165         return *this;
00166     };
00167 
00168 
00169 protected:
00170 
00172     double         sum;
00174     double         sum2;
00176     EGS_Float      tmp;
00178     unsigned short current_ncase;
00179 
00180 };
00181 
00195 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ScoringArray {
00196 
00197 public:
00198 
00203     EGS_ScoringArray(int N);
00204 
00206     ~EGS_ScoringArray();
00207 
00213     void setHistory(EGS_I64 ncase);
00214 
00220     inline void score(int ireg, EGS_Float f) {
00221         result[ireg].score(current_ncase_short,f);
00222     };
00223 
00230     EGS_Float currentScore(int ireg) const {
00231         return result[ireg].currentScore();
00232     };
00233 
00235     EGS_Float thisHistoryScore(int ireg) const {
00236         EGS_Float res; unsigned short nc;
00237         result[ireg].currentScore(res,nc);
00238         return nc == current_ncase_short ? res : 0;
00239     };
00240 
00246     void currentScore(int ireg, double &s, double &s2) {
00247         result[ireg].currentScore(s,s2);
00248     };
00249 
00255     void currentResult(int ireg, double &r, double &dr) {
00256         result[ireg].currentResult(current_ncase,r,dr);
00257     };
00258 
00277     void reportResults(double norm, const char *title, bool relative_error,
00278             const char *format = 0);
00279 
00291     bool storeState(ostream &data) {
00292         data << nreg << "  " << current_ncase_short << endl;
00293         if( !egsStoreI64(data,current_ncase) ) return false;
00294         if( !egsStoreI64(data,current_ncase_65536) ) return false;
00295         data << endl;
00296         for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00297             if( !result[j].storeState(data) ) return false;
00298         }
00299         return true;
00300     };
00301 
00309     bool setState(istream &data) {
00310         int nreg1; data >> nreg1 >> current_ncase_short;
00311         if( !data.good() || nreg1 < 1 ) return false;
00312         if( !egsGetI64(data,current_ncase) ) return false;
00313         if( !egsGetI64(data,current_ncase_65536) ) return false;
00314         if( nreg1 != nreg ) {
00315             if( nreg > 0 ) delete [] result;
00316             nreg = nreg1; result = new EGS_ScoringSingle [nreg];
00317         }
00318         for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00319             if( !result[j].setState(data) ) return false;
00320         }
00321         return true;
00322     };
00323 
00325     void reset() {
00326         current_ncase = 0; current_ncase_65536 = 0; current_ncase_short = 0;
00327         for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) result[j].reset();
00328     };
00329 
00336     EGS_ScoringArray &operator+=(const EGS_ScoringArray &x) {
00337         current_ncase += x.current_ncase;
00338         current_ncase_65536 = current_ncase >> 16;
00339         EGS_I64 aux = current_ncase - (current_ncase_65536 << 16);
00340         current_ncase_short = (unsigned short) aux;
00341         for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) result[j] += x.result[j];
00342         return *this;
00343     };
00344 
00349     int bins() const { return nreg; };
00350 
00355     int regions() const { return nreg; };
00356 
00357 protected:
00358 
00360     EGS_I64           current_ncase;
00362     EGS_I64           current_ncase_65536;
00365     int               nreg;
00367     EGS_ScoringSingle *result;
00372     unsigned short    current_ncase_short;
00373 
00374 };
